title: Killing Tech Debt: CodeLogic's Complex AI Solution
author: Loraine Lawson
description: CodeLogic CEO Edwin Gnichtel argues technical debt is a ball of mud that developers have created that cannot be resolved by humans alone.
cntitle: 消灭技术债务：CodeLogic 复杂的 AI 解决方案
cndescription: CodeLogic 首席执行官 Edwin Gnichtel 认为，技术债务是开发人员制造的一团泥，仅靠人力无法解决。
